name: War World: real time PvP strategy game
name_original: War World: real time PvP strategy game
description:
War World is a military strategy game. Austria fights againt Russia but who will win? Hold flags and objectives to gain more resources for soldiers, soldier-upgrades, tanks, covers, forward HQ's and giant airstrikes on three different maps.

You can play alone vs. AI or 1v1, 1v2, 2v2. Different weather conditions make the war even more realistic and difficult to spot enemies. Multiplayer works with Steam opened in the background.

Let yourself be surprised of the intensity of the game.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow-Keys --> camera movement
T --> retreat soldiers to base or forward HQ
Left Mouse Button --> select troups
Right Mouse Button --> move troups
Mouse Wheel --> camera zoom
Middle Mouse Button --> tilt camera
